headline: About Epoch Press
subline: 25 years of printing excellence. Trusted by publishers, businesses, and agencies across the United States.
story: Epoch Press was founded in 1999 by master printer Thomas Yuen with a single sheet-fed offset press and a commitment to uncompromising quality. What began as a small neighborhood print shop grew into one of the Northeast's leading commercial print facilities.
Today, Epoch Press operates a 60,000 sq ft state-of-the-art facility in New York, producing over 50 million pages annually for publishers, restaurants, agencies, and corporations nationwide.

We believe print endures. In an age of digital noise, a well-printed piece commands attention, conveys credibility, and creates lasting impressions. That belief drives every job that runs through our presses.
